item.title:
“If I could cast Cillian [Murphy] in every film I ever do, and just lean on him for the rest of my career, I'd be a happy man.” — Christopher Nolan.

item.title:
Halle Bailey stars in three films releasing this year:
• The Little Mermaid dir. Rob Marshall
• The Color Purple dir. Blitz Bazawule
• The Line dir. Ethan Berger
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
#TheLittleMermaid director Rob Marshall reveals Halle Bailey was the first person they met for the role of Ariel.
“We knew the moment we met her. She set the bar so high. We saw hundreds of people, and no one surpassed her.”
item.author: FilmUpdates
